meaningMnemonic: What kind of <radical>fish</radical> jumps from <radical>dirt</radical> to <radical>dirt</radical>? A <kanji>salmon</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: You make a drinking game out of watching the <kanji>salmon</kanji> going up stream. Every time one jumps onto the dirt, you drink a shot of <reading>酒</reading> (さけ). You realize you're drunk when you ask for more さけ but it comes out as <reading>しゃけ</reading>.
